name: ShineG In The SeaFight
description:
In the endless sea, our Shine begins his journey again.
The process of the game is simple, exploring more seas, eliminating more monsters, and constantly strengthening their warships
1.There are many different weapons available in the game
2.The role of the game can be upgraded to increase the firing rate, the number of bullets attribute ability
3.Depending on the score, you can unlock different endings, CG
4.The game will have a beautiful achievement Icon2
